title: Dark Mode consumes significantly more battery power
content:
Hello,

when using Dark Mode Theme the battery drain is significantly higher than in "light" mode.
To illustrate the facts i am observing

Dark Mode enabled Test Case

100% fully charge
Brightness fixed at 50%
Using Chrome for exact 5 min

Battery drain: 5% 

Light Mode enabled Test Case

100% fully charge
Brightness fixed at 50%
Using Chrome for exact 5 min

Battery drain: 1% 

I did this test case for 5 times in almost same conditions (same time, same location(for reception)

As of now i use none Dark Mode and battery Life on Android 10 is as expected.

Anyone else observing this?

Boris
